00389 #if defined(_EFM32_GIANT_FAMILY) || defined(_EFM32_WONDER_FAMILY)
00390 #define EBI_INIT_DEFAULT                                      \
00391 {                                                             \
00392   ebiModeD8A8,      /* 8 bit address, 8 bit data */           \
00393   ebiActiveLow,     /* ARDY polarity */                       \
00394   ebiActiveLow,     /* ALE polarity */                        \
00395   ebiActiveLow,     /* WE polarity */                         \
00396   ebiActiveLow,     /* RE polarity */                         \
00397   ebiActiveLow,     /* CS polarity */                         \
00398   ebiActiveLow,     /* BL polarity */                         \
00399   false,            /* enable BL */                           \
00400   false,            /* enable NOIDLE */                       \
00401   false,            /* enable ARDY */                         \
00402   false,            /* don't disable ARDY timeout */          \
00403   EBI_BANK0,        /* enable bank 0 */                       \
00404   EBI_CS0,          /* enable chip select 0 */                \
00405   0,                /* addr setup cycles */                   \
00406   1,                /* addr hold cycles */                    \
00407   false,            /* do not enable half cycle ALE strobe */ \
00408   0,                /* read setup cycles */                   \
00409   0,                /* read strobe cycles */                  \
00410   0,                /* read hold cycles */                    \
00411   false,            /* disable page mode */                   \
00412   false,            /* disable prefetch */                    \
00413   false,            /* do not enable half cycle REn strobe */ \
00414   0,                /* write setup cycles */                  \
00415   0,                /* write strobe cycles */                 \
00416   1,                /* write hold cycles */                   \
00417   false,            /* do not disable the write buffer */     \
00418   false,            /* do not enable halc cycle WEn strobe */ \
00419   ebiALowA0,        /* ALB - Low bound, address lines */      \
00420   ebiAHighA0,       /* APEN - High bound, address lines */    \
00421   ebiLocation0,     /* Use Location 0 */                      \
00422   true,             /* enable EBI */                          \
00423 }
00424 #else
00425 #define EBI_INIT_DEFAULT                               \
00426 {                                                      \
00427   ebiModeD8A8,        /* 8 bit address, 8 bit data */  \
00428   ebiActiveLow,       /* ARDY polarity */              \
00429   ebiActiveLow,       /* ALE polarity */               \
00430   ebiActiveLow,       /* WE polarity */                \
00431   ebiActiveLow,       /* RE polarity */                \
00432   ebiActiveLow,       /* CS polarity */                \
00433   false,              /* enable ARDY */                \
00434   false,              /* don't disable ARDY timeout */ \
00435   EBI_BANK0,          /* enable bank 0 */              \
00436   EBI_CS0,            /* enable chip select 0 */       \
00437   0,                  /* addr setup cycles */          \
00438   1,                  /* addr hold cycles */           \
00439   0,                  /* read setup cycles */          \
00440   0,                  /* read strobe cycles */         \
00441   0,                  /* read hold cycles */           \
00442   0,                  /* write setup cycles */         \
00443   0,                  /* write strobe cycles */        \
00444   1,                  /* write hold cycles */          \
00445   true,               /* enable EBI */                 \
00446 }

00509 #define EBI_TFTINIT_DEFAULT                                                         \
00510 {                                                                                   \
00511   ebiTFTBank0,                /* Select EBI Bank 0 */                               \
00512   ebiTFTWidthHalfWord,        /* Select 2-byte increments */                        \
00513   ebiTFTColorSrcMem,          /* Use memory as source for mask/blending */          \
00514   ebiTFTInterleaveUnlimited,  /* Unlimited interleaved accesses */                  \
00515   ebiTFTFrameBufTriggerVSync, /* VSYNC as frame buffer update trigger */            \
00516   false,                      /* Drive DCLK from negative edge of internal clock */ \
00517   ebiTFTMBDisabled,           /* No masking and alpha blending enabled */           \
00518   ebiTFTDDModeExternal,       /* Drive from external memory */                      \
00519   ebiActiveLow,               /* CS Active Low polarity */                          \
00520   ebiActiveLow,               /* DCLK Active Low polarity */                        \
00521   ebiActiveLow,               /* DATAEN Active Low polarity */                      \
00522   ebiActiveLow,               /* HSYNC Active Low polarity */                       \
00523   ebiActiveLow,               /* VSYNC Active Low polarity */                       \
00524   320,                        /* Horizontal size in pixels */                       \
00525   1,                          /* Horizontal Front Porch */                          \
00526   29,                         /* Horizontal Back Porch */                           \
00527   2,                          /* Horizontal Synchronization Pulse Width */          \
00528   240,                        /* Vertical size in pixels */                         \
00529   1,                          /* Vertical Front Porch */                            \
00530   4,                          /* Vertical Back Porch */                             \
00531   2,                          /* Vertical Synchronization Pulse Width */            \
00532   0x0000,                     /* Address offset to EBI memory base */               \
00533   5,                          /* DCLK Period */                                     \
00534   2,                          /* DCLK Start */                                      \
00535   1,                          /* DCLK Setup cycles */                               \
00536   1,                          /* DCLK Hold cycles */                                \
00537 }

00572 /***************************************************************************/
00579 __STATIC_INLINE void EBI_TFTEnable(EBI_TFTDDMode_TypeDef mode)
00580 {
00581   EBI->TFTCTRL = (EBI->TFTCTRL & ~(_EBI_TFTCTRL_DD_MASK)) | (uint32_t) mode;
00582 }
00583 
00584 
00585 /***************************************************************************/
00592 __STATIC_INLINE void EBI_TFTFrameBaseSet(uint32_t address)
00593 {
00594   EBI->TFTFRAMEBASE = (uint32_t) address;
00595 }
00596 
00597 
00598 /***************************************************************************/
00606 __STATIC_INLINE void EBI_TFTPixelSet(int pixel, uint32_t color)
00607 {
00608   EFM_ASSERT(pixel == 0 || pixel == 1);
00609 
00610   if (pixel == 0)
00611   {
00612     EBI->TFTPIXEL0 = color;
00613   }
00614   if (pixel == 1)
00615   {
00616     EBI->TFTPIXEL1 = color;
00617   }
00618 }
00619 
00620 
00621 /***************************************************************************/
00627 __STATIC_INLINE void EBI_TFTMaskBlendMode(EBI_TFTMaskBlend_TypeDef maskBlend)
00628 {
00629   EBI->TFTCTRL = (EBI->TFTCTRL & (~_EBI_TFTCTRL_MASKBLEND_MASK))|maskBlend;
00630 }
00631

00639 __STATIC_INLINE void EBI_TFTAlphaBlendSet(uint8_t alpha)
00640 {
00641   EBI->TFTALPHA = alpha;
00642 }

00645 /***************************************************************************/
00650 __STATIC_INLINE void EBI_TFTMaskSet(uint32_t mask)

00656 /***************************************************************************/
00661 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t EBI_TFTVCount(void)
00662 {
00663   return((EBI->TFTSTATUS & _EBI_TFTSTATUS_VCNT_MASK) >> _EBI_TFTSTATUS_VCNT_SHIFT);
00664 }
00665 
00666 
00667 /***************************************************************************/
00672 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t EBI_TFTHCount(void)
00673 {
00674   return((EBI->TFTSTATUS & _EBI_TFTSTATUS_HCNT_MASK) >> _EBI_TFTSTATUS_HCNT_SHIFT);
00675 }
00676 
00677 
00678 /***************************************************************************/
00688 __STATIC_INLINE void EBI_TFTFBTriggerSet(EBI_TFTFrameBufTrigger_TypeDef sync)
00689 {
00690   EBI->TFTCTRL = ((EBI->TFTCTRL & ~_EBI_TFTCTRL_FBCTRIG_MASK)|sync);
00691 }
00692 
00693 
00694 /***************************************************************************/
00701 __STATIC_INLINE void EBI_TFTHStrideSet(uint32_t nbytes)
00702 {
00703   EFM_ASSERT(nbytes < 0x1000);
00704 
00705   EBI->TFTSTRIDE = (EBI->TFTSTRIDE & ~(_EBI_TFTSTRIDE_HSTRIDE_MASK))|
00706     (nbytes<<_EBI_TFTSTRIDE_HSTRIDE_SHIFT);
00707 }

00782 /***************************************************************************/
00786 __STATIC_INLINE void EBI_StartNandEccGen(void)
00787 {
00788   EBI->CMD = EBI_CMD_ECCSTART | EBI_CMD_ECCCLEAR;
00789 }
00790 
00791 
00792 /***************************************************************************/
00799 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t EBI_StopNandEccGen( void )
00800 {
00801   EBI->CMD = EBI_CMD_ECCSTOP;
00802   return EBI->ECCPARITY;
00803 }
